rules.description: fromP - command shift p disable iterm
fromO - command shift o disable iterm
fromD iterm command d to control c
fromD Use Command+D to focus address bar in Firefox
control space to command space - spotlight
disable command shift semi colon in iterm
option n to command n new
iTerm Change Option + h/j/k/l to Arrows

to.shell_command:
osascript -e 'set temp to the clipboard 
 set the clipboard to ":hugging" 
 tell application "System Events" 
   keystroke "v" using command down 
   delay 0.1 
 end tell 
 set the clipboard to temp'

osascript -e 'set temp to the clipboard 
 set the clipboard to ":hearteyes" 
 tell application "System Events" 
   keystroke "v" using command down 
   delay 0.1 
 end tell 
 set the clipboard to temp'

rules.description: control command R to command shift R
iterm command f to control c
iterm option d to control d
iterm command o to control o
iterm command p to control p
iterm command shift p to control p
iterm command g to option g
iterm vim move to split H
iterm vim move to split L
iterm vim move split position H
iterm vim move split position J
iterm vim move split position K
iterm vim move split position L
iterm vim escape command to toggle term (option c)
iterm vim shift space to alt-t for toggle term
fromK - iterm vim cmd opt K to ctrl u
fromU - iterm vim cmd shift U to opt 7
fromI - iterm vim cmd shift I to opt shift 8
